intro.p: In Fall 2023, Harvard University released their latest Youth Poll where they asked young American adults about their political opinions, voting trends, and views on public service. They surveyed {{population }} 18 to 29 year old American adults from October 23 through November 6, 2023, of which {{sample}} responded. Of the poll participants, {{result}}\% {{outcome}}

content.p: What is the population that this study is trying to get information about?

outtro.p: The {{sample}} American adults aged 18 to 29 that were polled.

content.p: What is the variable used for this study?
What type of variable is the variable in question 3?
What is the sample statistic for this study?

outtro.p: The sample statistic is {{result}}\% of those polled {{outcome}}

content.p: What is the parameter of interest for this study? (the population parameter they are trying to gather information about)

outtro.p: The parameter of interest is what percentage of American young adults {{outcome}}
